title: Kagetora-san to Yobanaide.
original_name: 影虎さんと呼ばないで。
sinopse: Akane Kagetora is a girl who has never been in love, never had friends, and never even been called by her first name. She spends most of her time reading shojo manga alone hoping to someday have a life like one of the characters she reads about. Soon her lonely world begins to change when she befriends her classmates Arimura and Kurono who slowly pull her out of her lonely school life.
